body.name: Leaper Canvas Messenger Bag Sling Bag Cross Body Bag Shoulder Bag Black, L
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 5 hrs 39 mins
features: Material: Soft and durable Washed Canvas with PU Leather Decoration. The messenger sling bag is made of a very durable looking canvas material on the outside and a softer, more luxurious material inside the main compartment. NOTE: We have updated the tag, two tags are randomly sent. We appreciate your understanding.

Size: 10.2*13.6*4.4 in (L*H*W). The shoulder bag can fit a slim laptop up to 13" without laptop sleeve/case. This canvas backpack is not a large backpack, but it is a great size to take to a day trip or shopping. The bag can be either carried with the hand handle or adjustable shoulder strap. Weight: approx. 810g. The full length of the strap: approx. 41in.

The canvas backpack is vintage and multifunctional with lots of pockets. 1 zipper pocket is in the front flap; 1 zipper pocket and 1 open pocket are under the flap; 2 side pockets. The main compartment is fitted with two zip heads and pulls: 1 inner zipper pocket; 1 inner laptop pocket; 2 inner small pockets. A small laptop, wallet, snacks, tickets and magazine will all fit comfortably with room left over for add-ons.

The buckles on the top flap open and close easily and keep everything very secure. The zipper pocket on the top flap can put tickets and passport for easy access. The strap is adjustable and ultra-comfortable across your back and chest. It can act as a single-shoulder bag/sling bag, or a cross-body bag for use.

Stylish, Unisex and Effective: It is a nice little bag for college, working, dating, shopping and traveling in daily life. Although it is not waterproof, it can also be carried for outdoor activities, such as running, cycling, camping, etc. It is a great gift for your friends and family.
body.description: Leaper Stylish Messenger Bag Outdoor Sling Bag Good Quality, Stylish, Practical, Unisex & Effective This stylish bag combines modern style with high quality accents, careful construction, and durable hardware to create a timeless but modern style anyone can appreciate.Express yourself: different colors and 3 sizes for you to choose, you are sure to find your favoriteAlthough it is not waterproof, it can also be carried for outdoor activities, such as running, cycling, camping, etc. The full length of the strap: approx. 41in. It is a good choice as a gift for occasions like Christmas, Father's Day, Valentine’s Day, birthdays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish with plenty of room
reviews.reviewText: Size wise , it's a little bigger than i thought. But, it's good actually, because it's a perfect size for my husband's tablet. It also has a lot of pockets , where you can put your id's ,etc. since all the pockets and zippers are either in the front ,or on the side ,access to them is easier.I like the color and the style of it too. Quality wise, fabric seems pretty strong and durable. Overall ,it's a stylish and functional travel bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Found this to be a great bag with quality material. Sometimes it is hard to tell how cheap the inside is with terribly plastic like material, but this was not that cheap stuff. All of the straps, and elastic pieces also felt durable and of good quality. I have a 14.1 in laptop and it fits really well. There is decent padding in front to protect it. Plenty of pockets and storage. I am curious why they put the water bottle pocket on the same side as the charging port. Felt if hey switched sized and had the smaller pocket there instead, it would be perfect, but that is being nitpicky. Magnetic buttons snap well. Overall, would recommend this to any friend. The bag feels not too small and not too big. Cross strap is comfortable. If you pick it up by the handle with your laptop in it, it does put a little pressure on the corners of the laptop. However, if carrying by the cross body strap, there are no issues and that is how I would carry it anyways with how heavy I load the bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Confusing reviews? Read this
reviews.reviewText: This was just delivered so I can't say how durable this is - but what I can say is that it's very well stitched. I've added close up photos. The craftsmanship is great for this price point. After reading other reviews it makes me wonder if these people actually ordered the same bag! To be clear this is the canvas sling bag by Leaper. This is a size medium which is perfect for purse size.What I look for in a bag like this is a bigger compartment for stuff I need to have with me but don't always need access to with easier to get to pockets for things I do! This fits the bill perfectly. Big organized compartment and then a mix of sizes of easy to get to compartments for phone, wallet, etc.Some of the features aren't really highlighted - such as the multipurpose straps and loops. Which are not purely decorative.This will be a great all purpose bag - great for hiking or shopping. I want a purse bag that's tough - I can toss it in the car without fear of stuff falling out and that will stand up to multitasking, errand running, day trips whatever.It's every bit as great as I hoped it will be. If it doesn't hold up to the durability test, I will update my review.If you are looking for something to carry books, laptop or for serious hiking you would definitely want the bigger ones. And I'm considering ordering the larger size as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The Perfect Blend of Style and Functionality!
reviews.reviewText: Are you in search of a stylish and versatile messenger bag that can keep your belongings organized and secure? Look no further than the Leaper Canvas Messenger Bag! This bag offers a unique blend of fashion and functionality, making it a must-have accessory for students, professionals, and travelers alike.The Leaper Canvas Messenger Bag is made from high-quality canvas material that is durable and long-lasting. It comes in a beautiful sky blue color that is eye-catching and sure to turn heads. The bag's medium size makes it perfect for carrying all your daily essentials, including your laptop, books, and other items.One of the standout features of this messenger bag is its adjustable strap. You can easily adjust the strap to fit your body size, making it comfortable to wear for long periods of time. The bag's cross-body design allows you to keep your hands free while carrying it, which is especially useful if you're running errands or traveling.The Leaper Canvas Messenger Bag also has multiple pockets and compartments that help you stay organized. It has a large main compartment that can hold your laptop or books, as well as smaller pockets for your phone, wallet, and other accessories. The bag's zipper closures are also sturdy and secure, ensuring that your belongings stay safe and secure while you're on the go.In terms of style, the Leaper Canvas Messenger Bag is a real head-turner. Its sky blue color is unique and eye-catching, and its sleek design is sure to complement any outfit. The bag is also versatile enough to be used for a variety of occasions, from work and school to travel and leisure.Overall, the Leaper Canvas Messenger Bag is an excellent choice for anyone who is looking for a stylish and functional bag that can keep their belongings organized and secure. It's well-made, comfortable to wear, and versatile enough to be used for a variety of occasions. So why wait? Order your Leaper Canvas Messenger Bag today and enjoy the perfect blend of style and functionality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT COMPUTER BAG
reviews.reviewText: First and foremost let me start by saying I am absolutely IN LOVE WITH THIS BAG!!!Not only does it fit everything I need it holds MORE! The bag is made with class and style!! The fabric feels AMAZING and the leather on the straps is super clean! Speaking of the straps, talk about COMFORTABILITY!!! Your shoulders aren’t hurting, you can swap sides and there are plenty of compartments to put your small, medium, even large items.If you’re looking for a solid , sturdy, well made bag I HIGHLY suggest purchasing this one!! You will NOT be disappointed. I guarantee you will NOT be upset. Everytime I pick it up I smile because it’s THAT bomb!Even the locking mechanism is sturdy as hell! Purchase this bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This bag is amazing and it’s made of good quality.Can hold a lot of stuff and many pockets.can fit 14 inch laptop very easily
LLegaron en buen tiempo , la textura de la lona se siente durable y flexible. Los interiores estan forrados y con suficientes compartimientos, la talla es la XL. Saludos

reviews.reviewTitle: Bag is brown not army green as advertised
reviews.reviewText: Bag is small considering its an XL size, more like a medium. The colours are also not as advertised, I ordered the XL army green, the bag is actually brown. The website picture shows green pockets, they are brown, no green in sight. The bag seems ok but haven't used it so cant comment on its durability. Would definitely be too small for travelling, disappointing product for the price paid
Muy bonita, todos me la chulean y quiero comprarla en otros colores. Súper útil para cualquier ocasión y muy buena calidad el material.

This would be the third Leaper Messenger Bag I have purchased. One I have used everyday for the last three years, the second was a gift. This one is the XXL with locking tabs on the main compartment and a headphone/charging port which were features the others did not have. A larger bag with the extra features will be great for travel.- Lots of little pockets inside. Zipped pockets, slots for pens, pockets for electronics such as mobile phones or battery packs.- There is a padded compartment with a velcor flap suited to fit a small laptop/large tablet- There's a teathered clip in one of the pockets that would be perfect for a ring of keys so you don't have to rummage around for them- The charge/headphone port seems to be in working order thus far- The outer mesh pocket is deeper than the first bag. Seems more suited to holding a bottle of water- Light padding on the back is comfortable- Strap is easily adjusted and can be set for left or right shoulder.The colour is a little different than it appeared on my computer, but it still looks sharp. I know from experience that canvas does fade. Honestly, the magnetic snaps on the outer flap are the only thing I really don't like. I didn't like them on my first bag either. They tend to pop open alot. Not going to knock a star off this time around. I've gotten used to constantly making sure they are secured at this point.I think the bag is a great size for any sightseeing excursion/day trip or even a weekender. It's also a great size for carry-on luggage. Despite being a larger size, the XXL Messenger Bag wears pretty much the same as the smaller one I am used to. The strap fits comfortably over one shoulder and across the chest. Definitely a great gift idea. Also very practicle school bag, as there's more than enough room for books and a lunch kit/bento box.
